channel.title: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?
channel.description: Ive been hosting a server, and after a week i started noticing my internet has been really slow. usually about 10 people are on at the same time.

item.title: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“dcshoes1, post:18, topic:218356”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch™ link=topic=286935.msg2333533#msg2333533 date=1215992582]

[quote author=dcshoes1 link=topic=286935.msg2333518#msg2333518 date=1215992274]

it uses your bandwidth, so yes it will slow your internet down. don’t argue n00bs. and if you get on the internet while your server is online it can lagg your server very badly. so id save buy a new computer and put your server on it.
[/quote]i think you[b][size=15pt]’[/size]r[size=15pt]e[/size] right

If I’m not mistaken, please correct me if I’m wrong, but it uses upload bandwidth? Roughly 64kb/player(My estimation).
[/quote] dang, 64kb per player is alot :eek:[/quote]
I think it’s more than that.

Read full topic
item.source: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?

item.title: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?
item.dc:creator: @brovolll brovolll
item.description:
@brovolll wrote:

lol when you got a nooby connection [dialup , rogers , etc…] that happends when u host server but if u got a good pc with window vista and a awsome connection [ bell :D]d u wont lol like me… visa+bell+dell= pwnage lol

Read full topic
item.source: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?

item.title: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

uhmm im pretty sure everyone said what mattered… but yeah, i guess you could say it slows down your internet, but not exactly…

it doesnt slow down your connection, it just slows down your computer completely, therefor, slowing your connection to the internet

item.title: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?
item.dc:creator: @dcshoes1 dcshoes1
item.description:
@dcshoes1 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:17, topic:218356”][quote author=dcshoes1 link=topic=286935.msg2333518#msg2333518 date=1215992274]

it uses your bandwidth, so yes it will slow your internet down. don’t argue n00bs. and if you get on the internet while your server is online it can lagg your server very badly. so id save buy a new computer and put your server on it.
[/quote]i think your right

If I’m not mistaken, please correct me if I’m wrong, but it uses upload bandwidth? Roughly 64kb/player(My estimation).[/quote] dang, 64kb per player is alot :eek:

item.title: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“dcshoes1, post:16, topic:218356”][quote author=chris lol link=topic=286935.msg2331455#msg2331455 date=1215910810]
it uses your bandwidth, so yes it will slow your internet down. don’t argue n00bs. and if you get on the internet while your server is online it can lagg your server very badly. so id save buy a new computer and put your server on it.
[/quote]i think your right[/quote]

If I’m not mistaken, please correct me if I’m wrong, but it uses upload bandwidth? Roughly 64kb/player(My estimation).

item.title: Does hosting a server make your internet slow?

item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

it uses your bandwidth, so yes it will slow your internet down. don’t argue n00bs. and if you get on the internet while your server is online it can lagg your server very badly. so id save buy a new computer and put your server on it.
